author: cnbc.com
title: Investigation on Behalf of Facebook Investors Announced by Holzer & Holzer
text:
ATLANTA--(BUSINESS WIRE)-- Holzer & Holzer, LLC is investigating whether Facebook, Inc. (“Facebook” or the “Company”) (NASDAQ: FB) complied with the federal securities laws. On March 20, 2018, Facebook announced the Federal Trade Commission was investigating whether the Company had violated a consent decree regarding third-party access to users’ personal data. The price of Facebook stock fell significantly following the announcement.
If you purchased Facebook common stock between July 17, 2017 and March 20, 2018 and suffered a loss on that investment, you are encouraged to contact Corey D. Holzer, Esq. at cholzer@holzerlaw.com or Alexandria P. Rankin, Esq. at arankin@holzerlaw.com , or call the firm by toll-free telephone at (888) 508-6832.
Holzer & Holzer, LLC is an Atlanta, Georgia law firm that dedicates its practice to vigorous representation of shareholders and investors in litigation nationwide, including shareholder class action and derivative litigation. More information about the firm is available through its website, www.holzerlaw.com and upon request from the firm. Holzer & Holzer, LLC has paid for the dissemination of this promotional communication, and Corey D. Holzer is the attorney responsible for its content.
